citation: Strategic Infrastructure Corridors (Strategic and Recreational Use) (Derwent Valley Corridor from Third Avenue to Back River Road) Notice 2021 (Tas)
text:
Strategic Infrastructure Corridors (Strategic and Recreational Use) (Derwent Valley Corridor from Third Avenue to Back River Road) Notice 2021

I make the following notice under section 6 of the Strategic Infrastructure Corridors (Strategic and Recreational Use) Act 2016 .

30 November 2021

MICHAEL DARREL JOSEPH FERGUSON

Minister for Infrastructure and Transport

1. Short title
    This notice may be cited as the Strategic Infrastructure Corridors (Strategic and Recreational Use) (Derwent Valley Corridor from Third Avenue to Back River Road) Notice 2021 .

2. Commencement
    This notice takes effect on 17 December 2021.

3. Declaration of strategic infrastructure corridor
        (1) The areas of land identified as Area 1 and Area 2 on Plan 11084 in the Central Plan Register are –
                (a) designated to be land within a corridor; and
                (b) declared to be a strategic infrastructure corridor; and
                (c) assigned the name Derwent Valley Corridor from Third Avenue to Back River Road.
        (2) A reduced copy of Plan 11084 in the Central Plan Register is set out, by way of illustration only, in Schedule 1 , to this notice.

SCHEDULE 1 - Plan

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 8 December 2021

This notice is administered in the Department of State Growth.
